highlights: Mentor a select group of CS students by teaching basic coding habits, introducing industry tools, and guiding them through continous development of a legacy codebase.
Assist the program director with general support of 2 STEM oriented student organizations: SHPE and SACNAS.
Advised STEM students in progressing in their extracurriculars by revising personal statements and reviewing internship applications.
Deployed responsive, web application service to replace existing labor intensive quote system.
Implemented client/serverside testing for user input and compiled data into JSON necessary for an accurate quote.
Esablished a product roadmap with a vision of executing a refined and scalable product for  the client.
Integrated Node.js / Javascript frameworks such as NodeMailer, Toastr, OAuth, and Google Maps API.
Generated an automatic email  system to streamline job requests containing KML / PDF files from client input to the  company.
Constructed prototypes of UI and SQL Databases
Implemented a clear, minimal UI for seamless user interactions that is tailored to the end user.
Integrated an SQL database to store local data in a portable location for the ease of the client.

projects.name: Heartbeats
projects.description: Developed  a Mobile iOS Application that communicates with the apple watch to play different genres  of  music according to the BPM. Developed and Tested UI elements for a simpler design. Integrated Spotify's API to allow users to sign into the app with Spotify.

projects.name: DigiCard
projects.description: An Android Application that virtualizes business cards for networking. Enhanced UI for a detailed, user experience. Collaborated with colleagues to detail clear specifications within a constrained timeline.

projects.name: Flix
projects.description: An iOS application that utilizes a third party API to show recent released movies  and their information. Iterated through design process by receiving feedback for UI,  prototyping in increasing fidelity,  and testing across various devices.
